scripts.start: node -e 'let port = 3004; require("./src/index").listen(port, () => console.log(`Server is running on port ${port}`))' || node -e 'let port = 4001; require("./src/index").listen(port, () => console.log(`Server is running on port ${port}`))' || node -e 'let port = 4002; require("./src/index").listen(port, () => console.log(`Server is running on port ${port}`))'
